topics.body:
Since we're on the topic of anime fights post a awesome anime fight that chances are no one here has seen:

"Bakemonogatari":https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-HOAuiY5XFQ
The show was low budget, but they made the most out of it.
"Yozakura Quartet is full of awesome fights all around":https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=T4U1Vg8LF7Y
That fight literally lasts two episodes and just keeps going on and on and on.
